Room.Name: Purgatory
Room.Description: A large marble reception desk is layed out in a u-shape, spanning the entire room. Behind it lies the door of the lost souls. The door is carved from an unkown substance by the most highly skilled craftsman in the realm, a vivid depiction of those lost behind its walls screaming in agony, their faces contorted beyond recognition, desperately trying to break free.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: Entrance to the Vice and Sin Casino
Room.Description: As the door of the lost souls slams shut behind you, a wave of fear passes over you. You quickly realize you cannot go back the way you came. As you stare about you in dismay, you feel sweat beginning to drench your body, partially from your fear, partially from the almost unbearable heat. There is nothing in the room save for a red velvet carpet leading to a revolving door to the west. Above the door is a neon sign that reads, "Welcome to HELL!"

Room.Name: Top of the Stairs
Room.Description: After passing through the revolving door, you find yourself at the top of a giant staircase. Covered in the red velvet carpet, the stairs lead down into the heart of the casino. Music and laughter can clearly be heard from below. You chastise yourself for feeling so nervous.

Room.Name: The Stairs
Room.Description: Finely crafted oak banisters, stained to a brassy luster, lead up and down the stairs. Steep and narrow, they are highly treacherous to the unwary.

Room.Name: The Stairs
Room.Description: Finely crafted oak banisters, stained to a brassy luster, lead up and down the stairs. Steep and narrow, they are highly treacherous to the unwary.

Room.Name: Bottom of the Stairs
Room.Description: Standing at the bottom of the giant staircase, you are nearly deafened by the noise coming from the casino. Dealers can be heard calling out bets, as people laugh and chatter incescantly. The sound of glasses clinking together in toast to a winning hand adds to the feeling of merriment all around.

Room.Name: A Bedroom
Room.Description: Done all in red velvet, from the curtains to the bed coverings, this boudoir is a hotbed of illicit, immoral and deviate acts. A massive, four-poster bed dominates the room, barely leaving room for occupants to move about. Dresser draws have been built into the wall to better accomodate the over-sized bed.

Room.Name: A Hallway
Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: The Craps Tables
Room.Description: Rows of craps tables are laid out systematically so as to maximize the space available. A dealer stands at each table, taking bets and handing the dice to whoever is going to toss them.. People sit around them, laughing into their glasses as they place exorbitant wagers against the house and each other. Small fortunes are won and lost with each toss of the dice.

Room.Name: The Craps Tables
Room.Description: Rows of craps tables are laid out systematically so as to maximize the space available. A dealer stands at each table, taking bets and handing the dice to whoever is going to toss them.. People sit around them, laughing into their glasses as they place exorbitant wagers against the house and each other. Small fortunes are won and lost with each toss of the dice.

Room.Name: The Poker Tables
Room.Description: Rows of poker tables are laid out systematically so as to maximize the space available. A dealer stands at each table, taking bets and dealing cards. People sit around them, laughing into their glasses as they place exorbitant wagers against the house and each other. Small fortunes are won and lost with each hand.

Room.Name: The Poker Tables
Room.Description: Rows of poker tables are laid out systematically so as to maximize the space available. A dealer stands at each table, taking bets and dealing cards. People sit around them, laughing into their glasses as they place exorbitant wagers against the house and each other. Small fortunes are won and lost with each hand.

Room.Name: A Hallway
Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Room.Name: The Tabacco Shop
Room.Description: Smoke fills your lungs as you step into the store. Your eyes begin to water and you strain to see through the thick haze filling the entire room. Someone was obviously not paying attention to details and forgot to put in a ventilation system, Racks of pipes are stacked on the counters, while cigarettes, tabacco and cigars can vaguely be seen on shelves behind.

Room.Name: A Bedroom
Room.Description: Done all in red velvet, from the curtains to the bed coverings, this boudoir is a hotbed of illicit, immoral and deviate acts. A massive, four-poster bed dominates the room, barely leaving room for occupants to move about. Dresser draws have been built into the wall to better accomodate the over-sized bed.

Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Room.Name: The Candy Store
Room.Description: The smell of sugar and cocoa assail you the moment you enter the store. Specially designed shelves are brimming over with candies of every conceivable possibility. A large, oblong table graces the middle of the store, prominently displaying the confectionist's favorites treats.

Room.Name: A Bedroom
Room.Description: Done all in red velvet, from the curtains to the bed coverings, this boudoir is a hotbed of illicit, immoral and deviate acts. A massive, four-poster bed dominates the room, barely leaving room for occupants to move about. Dresser draws have been built into the wall to better accomodate the over-sized bed.

Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Room.Name: A Hallway
Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Room.Name: The Weapons Shop
Room.Description: Barrels of weapons are placed haphazardly throughout the shop, allowing little room for potential buyers to walk around and choose their weapon. Each weapon is skillfully crafted from finest materials in the realm.

Room.Name: A Bar
Room.Description: A small, gilded bar is recessed discretely into the wall of the lounge next to the entrace. Bottles of every imaginable alcohol are lined up in alphabetical order on specially designed shelves. A massive mirror is set behind the bottles, quietly reflecting the soft glow of candlelight. Looking across to the opposite side of the bar, you notice a second, identical bar recessed into the wall there.

Room.Name: A Bar
Room.Description: A small, gilded bar is recessed discretely into the wall of the lounge next to the entrace. Bottles of every imaginable alcohol are lined up in alphabetical order on specially designed shelves. A massive mirror is set behind the bottles, quietly reflecting the soft glow of candlelight. Looking across to the opposite side of the bar, you notice a second, identical bar recessed into the wall there.

Room.Name: A Group of Tables Scattered About
Room.Description: Large, unfinished, oaken tables are scattered all around the room, in between the bars and before the stage. Several high-backed chairs, upholstered in red velvet, can be seen around each table, all facing towards the stage. The floor is done in rough-hewn wood, expertly pieced together so that not even the slightest crack can be found.

Room.Name: The Stage
Room.Description: A large stage of pitch-black ebony is set into the west wall of the lounge. Lava pits surround the stage from all sides, except for three small walkways leading to the dressing rooms. They act as deterrents to any who would get on the stage with the girls and as lighting. Several gilded poles are set throughout the stage to aid the strippers in their dances.

Room.Name: A Dressing Room
Room.Description: Barely bigger than a closet, the girls cram their clothes onto a bar running the full length of the south wall. Directly across, a dressing table as been built into the wall, jam packed with makeup, perfumes and other odds and ends. Several girls stand before the mirror, trying to see themselves well enough to get ready for their next show.

Room.Name: A Hallway
Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Den of Iniquity
Room.Description: A small, intimate lounge stretches out before you. A number of tables clutter most of available space in the room. To the west is a large stage surrounded by lava. Music can be heard from an unknown source, while strippers perform for the patrons pleasures. Two small bars can be seen to the north and south.

Room.Name: A Group of Tables Scattered About
Room.Description: Large, unfinished, oaken tables are scattered all around the room, in between the bars and before the stage. Several high-backed chairs, upholstered in red velvet, can be seen around each table, all facing towards the stage. The floor is done in rough-hewn wood, expertly pieced together so that not even the slightest crack can be found.

Room.Description: Rows of blackjack tables are laid out systematically so as to maximize the space available. A dealer stands at each table, taking bets and dealing cards. People sit around them, laughing into their glasses as they place exorbitant wagers against the house and each other. Small fortunes are won and lost as each hand is played.

Room.Description: Rows of blackjack tables are laid out systematically so as to maximize the space available. A dealer stands at each table, taking bets and dealing cards. People sit around them, laughing into their glasses as they place exorbitant wagers against the house and each other. Small fortunes are won and lost as each hand is played.

Room.Name: The Roulette Wheels
Room.Description: Rows of roulette tables are laid out systematically so as to maximize the space available. A dealer stands at each table, taking bets and spinning the wheel. People sit around them, laughing into their glasses as they place exorbitant wagers against the house and each other. Small fortunes are won and lost each time the wheel stops.

Room.Name: The Toy Store
Room.Description: Filled to the brim, the toy store carries every imagineable item, and some that cannot be imagined, to bring sexual pleasure. Thousands of books line the shelves along the walls, while the center of the store is piled high with toys and lotions.

Room.Name: The Decadent Deserts Shop
Room.Description: Every available shelf and counter space is overrun with delectible goodies make to tempt even the strongest of wills and to please even the most discering of palates. Artfully decorated, each desert is a perfect masterpiece of taste and scent.

Room.Name: A Bedroom
Room.Description: Done all in red velvet, from the curtains to the bed coverings, this boudoir is a hotbed of illicit, immoral and deviate acts. A massive, four-poster bed dominates the room, barely leaving room for occupants to move about. Dresser draws have been built into the wall to better accomodate the over-sized bed.

Room.Name: A Hallway
Room.Description: Murals depicting scenes of wanton acts and heinous misdeeds are painted directly onto the walls. The scenes flow into each other, creating a giant panorama of horror and lust. The floors are carpeted in red velvet, worn thin from many years of use.

Room.Name: The Liquor Store
Room.Description: Rows of racks, generally used to store wine, are filled with with an assortment of liquor bottles. Wiskey, gin, rum and and every other hard liquor you could want are here for you to purchase. Several, large barrels of beer are stacked along the back wall.

Room.Name: Top of the Stairs
Room.Description: Two large staircases, carpeted in the same red velvet as the rest of the casino, lead down into the depths of hell. Waves of intense heat rise up from the abyss, drenching you in sweat. Trepidition takes hold of you, causing a chill to run down your spine and you to carefully reconsider going any further.

Room.Name: Top of the Stairs
Room.Description: Two large staircases, carpeted in the same red velvet as the rest of the casino, lead down into the depths of hell. Waves of intense heat rise up from the abyss, drenching you in sweat. Trepidition takes hold of you, causing a chill to run down your spine and you to carefully reconsider going any further.

Room.Name: The Stairs
Room.Description: Finely crafted oak banisters, stained to a brassy luster, lead up and down the stairs. Steep and narrow, they are highly treacherous to the unwary.

Room.Name: The Stairs
Room.Description: Finely crafted oak banisters, stained to a brassy luster, lead up and down the stairs. Steep and narrow, they are highly treacherous to the unwary.

Room.Name: Bottom of the Stairs
Room.Description: Awash with fear and sweat, you wonder if you should proceed or return back up the stairs. A giant labyrinth stretches out before you, threatening to lose you forever within it's fiery depths. The heat has become so unbearable that you can hardly breath anymore.

Room.Name: Bottom of the Stairs
Room.Description: Awash with fear and sweat, you wonder if you should proceed or return back up the stairs. A giant labyrinth stretches out before you, threatening to lose you forever within it's fiery depths. The heat has become so unbearable that you can hardly breath anymore.

Room.Name: Labyrinth of the Underworld
Room.Description: Of pitch black ebony, the stone walkways are just wide enough for two people to pass each other without falling into the molten lava pits found on either side. Occasionally the lava flares upward, splattering the pathways and burning any who are unfortunate enough to be walking along where it lands. Fumes rise up from the pits, making this otherwise easily transgressible maze nearly impossible to navigate.

Room.Name: The Underpass
Room.Description: It's pitch black...

Room.Name: The Heart of Hell
Room.Description: Your blood starts to boil as you enter a raging inferno of fire and brimstone, then freezes as you find yourself face to face with MASTER of hell himself...

Occasionally the lava flares upward, splattering the pathways and burning any who are unfortunate enough to be walking along where it lands. Fumes rise up from the pits, making this otherwise easily transgressible maze nearly impossible to navigate.

Room.Name: Labyrinth of the Underworld
Room.Description: Of pitch black ebony, the stone walkways are just wide enough for two people to pass each other without falling into the molten lava pits found on either side. Occasionally the lava flares upward, splattering the pathways and burning any who are unfortunate enough to be walking along where it lands. Fumes rise up from the pits, making this otherwise easily transgressible maze nearly impossible to navigate.

Room.Name: Labyrinth of the Underworld
Room.Description: Of pitch black ebony, the stone walkways are just wide enough for two people to pass each other without falling into the molten lava pits found on either side. Occasionally the lava flares upward, splattering the pathways and burning any who are unfortunate enough to be walking along where it lands. Fumes rise up from the pits, making this otherwise easily transgressible maze nearly impossible to navigate.

Room.Name: Labyrinth of the Underworld
Room.Description: Of pitch black ebony, the stone walkways are just wide enough for two people to pass each other without falling into the molten lava pits found on either side. Occasionally the lava flares upward, splattering the pathways and burning any who are unfortunate enough to be walking along where it lands. Fumes rise up from the pits, making this otherwise easily transgressible maze nearly impossible to navigate.

Room.Name: Labyrinth of the Underworld
Room.Description: Of pitch black ebony, the stone walkways are just wide enough for two people to pass each other without falling into the molten lava pits found on either side. Occasionally the lava flares upward, splattering the pathways and burning any who are unfortunate enough to be walking along where it lands. Fumes rise up from the pits, making this otherwise easily transgressible maze nearly impossible to navigate.

Room.Name: Labyrinth of the Underworld
Room.Description: Of pitch black ebony, the stone walkways are just wide enough for two people to pass each other without falling into the molten lava pits found on either side. Occasionally the lava flares upward, splattering the pathways and burning any who are unfortunate enough to be walking along where it lands. Fumes rise up from the pits, making this otherwise easily transgressible maze nearly impossible to navigate.

NPC.name: tabacco dealer
NPC.description: Gaunt and haggard, his skin yellowed from a lifetime of smoking, the tabacco dealer lights his next cigarette before he even finishes the one he's currently puffing away at.
NPC.longDescription: The tabacco dealer puffs on one cigarette after another.

NPC.name: confectionist
NPC.description: Corpulent and jolly, the confectionist eats far more than he sells to his customers. His fingers become sticky with chocolate as he samples one of his delicious truffles.
NPC.longDescription: The confectionist pops a piece of chocolate into his mouth.

NPC.name: weapon smith
NPC.description: A cruel looking man, he has spent his entire life making the finest weapons the land has ever seen. His face is pinched from squinting as he works with the fire. His shoulders are stooped and his back is hunched from his many years of manual labor.
NPC.longDescription: The weapon's smith carefully sharpens a sword on a grinding stone.

NPC.name: purveyor porn
NPC.description: Jaded by all the pornorgraphy surrounding him, he barely notices as you enter his shop. Without even bothering to greet you, he turns his back to the book of erotica in his hands.
NPC.longDescription: The purveyor of porn flicks disinterestedly through a pillow book.

NPC.name: baker
NPC.description: Rotund and jolly, the baker really delights in his work, especially when he gets to sample it. He eats as much, if not more, of his goods as he sells.
NPC.longDescription: The baker expertly frosts a german chocolate cake.

NPC.name: brewer
NPC.description: His skin is sallow and leathery. He smiles blearily at you through blood-shot eyes sunken deep into his face. He raises a shot glass in toast to you, then tosses it back.
NPC.longDescription: The brewer slams back a shot of tequila and smiles drunkely at you.

NPC.name: bartender
NPC.description: Sallow skinned and sunken eyed, the bartender stares vacantly at you as he waits for you to order. With casual disdain, he mixes a drink and tosses it back.
NPC.longDescription: The bartender lazily wipes down the bar as he waits for customers.

NPC.name: scratch
NPC.description: A massive form, distorted beyond recognition, glares at you, it's hatred of all life burning deep into your soul. Half human, half reptile, he stands taller than the largest giant. Thick, spiraling horns rise nearly a foot above his oversized head. His skin is leathery and scortching hot to the touch. A thin, whip-like tail repeatedly taps one cloven hoof. His clawed hands, clenched in rage, lash violently through the air toward your throat, missing you by mere inches.
NPC.longDescription: Baal throws back his head and laughs mercilessly at you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead Cleric Mage Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Flying Haste Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: dealer
NPC.description: He keeps a sharp eye on all the people at his table, watching for cheaters and aiding them when he catches them. Short and stocky, he is dressed in a red velvet tux, which makes him blend perfectly into the background.
NPC.longDescription: A dealer patiently waits to take your bets.

NPC.name: seccubi
NPC.description: Spiked, stiletto heels, fishnet stockings attached to a leather garter belt and a red leather bodysuit, tightly molded to her curvaceous body, blind you to the deadly magic she so casually weilds. She smiles seductively at you, but something deep inside warns you to stay away...
NPC.longDescription: A seccubi lounges luxuriously on the bed.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Mage AreaAttack

NPC.name: gambler
NPC.description: He's a professional through and through; somedays he's drinking champagne and eating caviar and other days he can barely scrape two coins together. With stoic indifference, he takes it all in stride.
NPC.longDescription: A gambler nonchalantly places a wager.

NPC.name: waiter
NPC.description: With agile dexterity and grace, he moves through the crowds, never spilling even the tiniest drop of alcohol as he delivers drinks, which is surprising considering he looks to be quite drunk himself.
NPC.longDescription: A waiter moves from table to table taking orders.

NPC.name: stripper
NPC.description: Her body is lithe and sinuous, yet still very volumptuous. She is extremely good at what she does. Without hesitation, she teasingly and provocatively bares all for the pleasure of those watching her.
NPC.longDescription: A stripper dances for the pleasure of the patrons.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Undead AreaAttack

NPC.name: demon
NPC.description: With clumsy steps, he stalks back and forth along the walkway in intense agitation, mumbling distractedly to himself. He is blind in one eye, you assume from splattering lava as his leathery skin is haphazardly scarred by dozens of burn marks. Saliva drips down his chin making him appear rabid. He is truly a hideous sight.
NPC.longDescription: A demon mutters to agitatedly to himself.

NPC.name: bouncer
NPC.description: He scans about, looking for trouble. When he sees a fight brewing, he goes over and eggs on the antagonists. He waits for the brawl to get into full swing, watching to see who's most likely to win, then jumps in and helps thrash the loser.
NPC.longDescription: A bouncer watches for signs of trouble.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: Thanatos
NPC.description: Faceless...he stands silently before you, patiently awaiting your soul.

NPC.name: patron
NPC.description: He drunkenly leers at the strippers, oogling them lustily. With greedy anticipation, he waits for them to come to his table so he can pay them for table dances.
NPC.longDescription: A patron waves gold pieces at the strippers.

Item.Name: banana cream pie
Item.LongDescription: A banana cream pie entices you.

Item.Name: german chocolate cake
Item.LongDescription: A german chocolate cake sets your mouth to watering.

Item.Name: double-fudge brownies
Item.LongDescription: Some double-fudge brownies tempt you to take a bite.

Item.Name: strawberry cheescake
Item.LongDescription: A strawberry cheescake waits to be eaten.

Item.Name: boston cream pie
Item.LongDescription: A boston cream pie beckons to you.

Item.Name: bottle champagne
Item.LongDescription: A bottle of champagne is chilling here.

Item.Name: bottle rum

Item.Name: bottle whisky

Item.Name: bottle vodka

Item.Name: shot rum

Item.Name: glass beer

Item.Name: snifter brandy
Item.LongDescription: A snifter of brandy is here.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A small key blazes brightly on the ground.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A tiny black key lays hidden in the dirt.

Item.Name: key
Item.LongDescription: A tiny black key lays hidden in the dirt.

Item.Name: bed
Item.LongDescription: A king-sized feather bed takes up most of the space available.
Item.ExtraFlags: StandAt StandOn SitOn SitIn RestIn SleepAt PutAt PutOn

Item.Name: gaming table
Item.LongDescription: A gaming table and stools lay symmetrical to all the tables around it.
Item.ExtraFlags: StandOn SitAt SitIn RestOn RestIn SleepAt SleepOn SleepIn PutAt PutOn PutIn

Item.Name: symbol baal
Item.LongDescription: The Symbol of Baal glints with a tumultuous fire.

Item.Name: talisman baal
Item.ShortDescription: a Talisman Carved in Baal's Image
Item.LongDescription: A Talisman Carved in Baal's Imaged flashes evily at you.

Item.Name: upside-down crucifix
Item.LongDescription: A deadly looking cross made of thorns lays here collecting dust.

Item.Name: bracer lies
Item.LongDescription: A Bracer of Lies lays neglected on the floor.

Item.Name: bracer edacity
Item.LongDescription: A Bracer of Edacity lays forgotten in the dirt.

Item.Name: demonic armguards
Item.LongDescription: A Pair of Demonic Armguards lays discarded in a corner.

Item.Name: vice
Item.LongDescription: A corrupt looking ring lies fogotten on the ground.

Item.Name: sin
Item.LongDescription: A vile looking ring catches your eye.

Item.Name: cape baal flesh
Item.ShortDescription: a Cape made from Baal's Flesh
Item.LongDescription: A Cape made from Baal's Flesh lays balled up in a corner.

Item.Name: cloven hooves baal
Item.LongDescription: The Cloven Hooves of Baal are covered in dust.

Item.Name: belt coiled tail baal
Item.ShortDescription: a Belt made from the Coiled Tail of Baal
Item.LongDescription: An wicked looking piece of flesh lays coiled on the ground.

Item.Name: baal pitchfork
Item.LongDescription: A flaming pitchfork from the depths of hell smoulders here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Evil NoDrop NoRemove MeltDrop BurnProof TwoHands

Item.Name: tough hide baal
Item.LongDescription: The Toughened Hide of Baal looks foreboding.

Item.Name: helm horns baal
Item.ShortDescription: a Helm made from the Horns of Baal
Item.LongDescription: A Helm made from the Horns of Baal rest on the ground.

Item.Name: legplates damned
Item.LongDescription: Legplates of the Damned lay in a forgotten heap.

Item.Name: clenched claws
Item.LongDescription: The Clenched Claws of Baal lay in a crumpled heap.

Item.Name: table
Item.LongDescription: A table and chairs is set haphazardly amongst all the other tables.
Item.ExtraFlags: StandAt StandOn SitAt SitOn SitIn RestOn RestIn SleepAt SleepOn SleepIn PutAt PutOn PutIn

Item.Name: bar
Item.LongDescription: A gilded bar is lined with bar stools.
Item.ExtraFlags: StandAt StandOn SitAt SitOn SitIn RestOn RestIn SleepAt SleepOn SleepIn PutAt PutOn PutIn

Item.Name: thanatos scythe
Item.LongDescription: A wicked looking scythe gleams demonically up at you.

Item.Name: robe illbegotten souls
Item.ShortDescription: a Robe made from Illbegotten Souls
Item.LongDescription: A Robe made from Illbegotten Souls screams in agony.

Item.Name: money belt
Item.LongDescription: A strong leather belt pouch lies here.

Item.Name: royal flush
Item.LongDescription: The quintessential dead man's hand lays concealed in the corner.

Item.Name: red velvet vest
Item.LongDescription: A heap of red velvet lays on the floor.

Item.Name: visor
Item.LongDescription: A visor, made of red velvet, rests on the ground.

Item.Name: quill
Item.LongDescription: A quilled pen flutter gently in the breeze.

Item.Name: inkwell
Item.LongDescription: An inwell lays on the ground, partially tipped over, slowly leaking.

Item.Name: spiked stiletto heels
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of spiked, stiletto heels
Item.LongDescription: A pair of spiked, stiletto heels lays tossed in the corner.

Item.Name: fishnet stockings
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of french cut, fishnet stockings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of french cut, fishnet stockings lays in a forgotten heap.

Item.Name: lacy garter belt
Item.LongDescription: A lacy garter belt lies here.

Item.Name: red velvet lace teddy
Item.ShortDescription: a red velvet teddy trimmed with lace
Item.LongDescription: A pile of red velvet and lace lays discarded on the floor.

Item.Name: gold ring diamond
Item.ShortDescription: a gold ring with a large diamond embedded in it
Item.LongDescription: A gold ring with a large diamond embedded in it lies on the ground.

Item.Name: herringbone bracelet
Item.LongDescription: A thick gold band lays unnoticed on the floor.

Item.Name: herringbone necklace
Item.LongDescription: A thich strip of gold glints up from the dirt.

Item.Name: satin gloves
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red satin gloves
Item.LongDescription: Some red satin lays in a tiny heap on the ground.

Item.Name: boa
Item.LongDescription: A pile of bright red feathers ripples at the slightest breeze.

Item.Name: lycra minidress
Item.LongDescription: A bright red, lycra minidress shimmers on the floor.

Item.Name: tankard ale
Item.LongDescription: A tankard of ale is spilling onto the floor.
